polygon.style: fill: rgb(215, 243, 243); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(160, 199, 227); paint-order: stroke; stroke-width: 43px;
fill: rgb(141, 185, 233); stroke: rgb(141, 185, 233); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 7px;

path.style: fill: rgb(104, 113, 148); stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(160, 199, 227); paint-order: stroke; stroke-width: 22px;
